Key Match Events: Shaedon Sharpe completed multiple athletic finishes at the rim
Toumani Camara made an easy layup after a pass from Sharpe
Robert Williams made a corner three-pointer, a first in his NBA career
Post-Match Reflections: Chauncey Billups expressed pride in Sharpe's performance and was excited to have Williams back on the court
Billups mentioned that finding minutes for both players will be a challenge
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both Shaedon Sharpe and Robert Williams returned to the court after extended absences due to injuries
Sharpe played in two games, posting 13 points and 2 rebounds in his first game, and 6 points and 2 rebounds in his second game
Williams played in one game, posting 13 points, 3 rebounds, and 2 assists in 17 minutes
Others: The Trail Blazers are trying to find a rhythm with their new rotation, which has been affected by the return of Sharpe and Williams
